verses.verse: Now Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had been taken <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and Potiphar, <S%H6318><s%> an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%> officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the bodyguard, <S%H2876><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> him from the Ishmaelites, <S%H3459><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had taken <S%H3381><s%> him down <S%H3381><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> so he became <S%H1961><s%> a successful <S%H6743><s%> man. <S%H376><s%> And he was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his master, <S%H113><s%> the Egyptian. <S%H4713><s%>

Now his master <S%H113><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with him and [how] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> caused all <S%H3605><s%> that he did <S%H6213><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in his sight, <S%H5869><s%> and became <S%H8334><s%> his personal <S%H8334><s%> servant; <S%H8334><s%> and he made <S%H6485><s%> him overseer <S%H6485><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that he owned <S%H3426><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> in his charge. <S%H3027><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about that from the time <S%H227><s%> he made <S%H6485><s%> him overseer <S%H6485><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he owned, <S%H3426><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Egyptian's house <S%H1004><s%> on account <S%H1558><s%> of Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> thus the Lord's blessing <S%H1293><s%> was upon all <S%H3605><s%> that he owned, <S%H3426><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> and in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

So he left <S%H5800><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> he owned in Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s charge; <S%H3027><s%> and with him [there] he did not concern <S%H3045><s%> himself with anything <S%H3972><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the food <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he ate. <S%H398><s%> Now Joseph was handsome <S%H3303><s%> in form <S%H8389><s%> and appearance. <S%H4758><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> events <S%H1697><s%> that his master's wife <S%H802><s%> looked <S%H5375><s%> <S%H5869><s%> with desire <S%H5375><s%> at Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> "Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me."

But he refused <S%H3985><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to his master <S%H113><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> with me [here,] my master does not concern <S%H3045><s%> himself with anything <S%H4100><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and he has put <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he owns <S%H3426><s%> in my charge. <S%H3027><s%>

"There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one greater <S%H1419><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> I, and he has withheld <S%H2820><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> from me except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> you, because <S%H834><s%> you are his wife. <S%H802><s%> How <S%H349><s%> then could I do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> evil, <S%H9567><s%> and sin <S%H2398><s%> against God <S%H430><s%>?"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about as she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> after day, <S%H3117><s%> that he did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to her to lie <S%H7901><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> her, [or] be with her.

Now it happened <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that he went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> his work, <S%H4399><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> <S%H376><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of the household <S%H1004><s%> was there <S%H8033><s%> inside. <S%H1004><s%>

And she caught <S%H8610><s%> him by his garment, <S%H899><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me!" And he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%> and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>
When she saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and had fled <S%H5127><s%> outside, <S%H2351><s%>

she called <S%H7121><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of her household, <S%H1004><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "See, <S%H7200><s%> he has brought <S%H935><s%> in a Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> to us to make <S%H6711><s%> sport <S%H6711><s%> of us; he came <S%H935><s%> in to me to lie <S%H7901><s%> with me, and I screamed <S%H7121><s%>. <S%H6963><s%> <S%H1419><s%>

"And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when he heard <S%H8085><s%> that I raised <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and screamed, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> me and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>"
So she left <S%H5117><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> her until <S%H5704><s%> his master <S%H113><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home. <S%H1004><s%>

Then she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him with these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> "The Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> slave, <S%H5650><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you brought <S%H935><s%> to us, came <S%H935><s%> in to me to make <S%H6711><s%> sport <S%H6711><s%> of me;

and it happened <S%H1961><s%> as I raised <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and screamed, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> me and fled <S%H5127><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%> "

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when his master <S%H113><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him, saying, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H1697><s%> <S%H428><s%> is what <S%H1697><s%> your slave <S%H5650><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to me," that his anger <S%H639><s%> burned. <S%H2734><s%>

So Joseph's master <S%H113><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him and put <S%H5414><s%> him into the jail, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the king's prisoners <S%H615><s%> were confined; <S%H631><s%> and he was there <S%H8033><s%> in the jail. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and extended <S%H5186><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to him, and gave <S%H5414><s%> him favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the chief <S%H8269><s%> jailer. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>

And the chief <S%H8269><s%> jailer <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> committed <S%H5414><s%> to Joseph's charge <S%H3027><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the prisoners <S%H615><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were in the jail <S%H1004><s%>; <S%H5470><s%> so that whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> was done <S%H6213><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> he was responsible <S%H6213><s%> [for it.]

The chief <S%H8269><s%> jailer <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> did not supervise <S%H7200><s%> anything <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3972><s%> under Joseph's charge <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with him; and whatever <S%H834><s%> he did, <S%H6213><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made to prosper. <S%H6743><s%>
